title: Antlion Charger
summaries: The Antlion Charger is an enemy similar in appearance to the Antlion. Unlike the Antlion, the Antlion Charger will, as its name suggests, charge at the player instead of remaining stationary. It is found in the Underground Desert or on surface Deserts during pre-Hardmode Sandstorms. It can rarely drop the Mandible Blade.

statistics.Environment: Underground Desert Sandstorm
statistics.Banner: [img:Antlion Charger Banner]Antlion Charger Banner
